revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go. Added transcription of frr. 2 and 3 and trimmed the introduction and commentary, as well, much of which was superfluous to the needs of DCLP.
Finalized - This is good to go. Added transcription of frr. 2 and 3 and trimmed the introduction and commentary, as well, much of which was superfluous to the needs of DCLP.

Submit - Originally submitted to litpap.info 2017.12.09 by Rebekah McKay. Submission has been transferred to papyri.info. Submission notes were: “Submitting for Todd Hickey's Herodotus (GRK 120) class project.“
